summary:
**Dragon Quest**, a popular Japanese role-playing game series, was first released in 1986. Created by Yuji Horii, Akira Toriyama, and Koichi Sugiyama, it's published by Square Enix. The games are about a hero who saves the world from evil. They feature turn-based combat, random encounters, and cute, recurring monsters like Slimes.

Originally called **Dragon Warrior** in North America to avoid a trademark conflict, the series has had a big impact on other RPGs. It's available on many platforms and has spin-offs, manga, anime, and novels.
title: Dragon Quest
